intro: Valerianella caerulea, commonly known as blueweed, is a flowering plant native to Europe, Asia, and North Africa. Valerianella caerulea is an annual or biennial herb that produces small, capsule-like fruits containing numerous seeds. It is also known for its mild, aromatic scent and has been used in traditional herbal medicine.
